thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hang Lung Properties Says FY Net Profit Attributable To Shareholders HK$8.12 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hang Lung Properties Says FY Net Profit Attributable To Shareholders HK$8.12 Bln
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Hang Lung Properties Ltd:
* FY NET PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE TO SHAREHOLDERS HK$8.12 BILLION VERSUS HK$6.20 BILLION A YEAR AGO
* FY REVENUE HK$11.20 BILLION VERSUS HK$13.06 BILLION A YEAR AGO
* BOARD RECOMMENDED FINAL DIVIDEND OF HK58 CENTS PER SHARE FOR 2017
* ‍“OUR FOCUS FOR 2018 IS TO DRIVE RETAIL SALES AND RENTAL GROWTH IN HONG KONG AND SHANGHAI”​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
